newsitem.title: USA: Gruntal names PaineWebber's Byers CFO.
newsitem.headline: Gruntal names PaineWebber's Byers CFO.

text.p: Gruntal & Co LLC said Monday it named Stephen Byers chief financial officer.
Gruntal said Byers, 43, served most recently as managing director and chief administrative and operations officer PaineWebber Group Inc's Mitchell Hutchins Asset Management Division.
Gruntal said Byers succeeds Lee Fensterstock, who will continue as the firm's president and chief operating officer.
